mean_cn: n. 唯物主义，物质主义
mean_en: the belief that money, possessions and physical comforts are more important than spiritual values; the belief that only material things exist
sentence: Even though I don't believe in materialism, I'd still prefer a suit to this barrel!
sentence_trans: 虽然我不是一个物质主义者，但是比起这木桶，我还是更想要西装。
word_etyma: material物质 + ism主义 → materialism唯物主义
